name: FetchExecutionContext
description: Retrieve the most recent context for an Execution.

FlowSid.description: The SID of the Flow with the Execution context to fetch.

ExecutionSid.description: The SID of the Execution context to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the ExecutionContext resource.

**context**: The current state of the Flow's Execution. As a flow executes, we save its state in this context. We save data that your widgets can access as variables in configuration fields or in text areas as variable substitution.
**execution_sid**: The SID of the context's Execution resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
